column4: I got something very strange here. I want to install a package with apt-get and for some reason it is telling me that a bunch of packages need to be installed / removed / etc.. Including "apt" needs to be installed??? Somebody any idea how to fix this?
it's normal,  some packaged have dependencies that need install,  have other package that they conflict or replace that need to be removed
yes that I know. But the packages that its saying dont have anything to do with the package I want to install. Why is it saying I need to install apt while im executing with apt.
apt is probably missing something in it
